Using the OpenAI API (ChatGPT), I created a Chrome plugin that instantly analyzes content and delivers answers right to your screen.

Pre-requisite:
BYOK - Open API Key
https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936850-where-do-i-find-my-openai-api-key

I do  not save or manage any of the keys that you have entered.
